translations: n．保护者，维护者：保护、维护某物或某人的人。
· The environmentalists are the preservers of our planet.
环保人士是我们地球的保护者。

sentences.sentence: The police are the preservers of law and order.
The Testing center will preservers some samples for future reference.
sentences.translation: 检验结束后，我中心将留存部分样品备查。

sentences.sentence: Of course, many conservatives want to get rid of life preservers altogether.
sentences.translation: 当然，许多保守连想连救生圈一起摆脱掉。
